content.prompt: Which statement best describes the effect on water transport across the cell membrane if the aquaporin in the figure ceases to function?

choices.label: Water molecules will no longer be able to move across the cell membrane.
Water molecules will still be able to move across the cell membrane but at a slower rate.
Water molecules will only be able to enter the cell by active transport.
Water molecules will move across the cell membrane at a faster rate without the aquaporin regulating their flow.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
